articles.content: A naughty party on a lawn. Drunk posh people swanning about while oozing entitlement. Everyone acting like the normal rules dont apply to them. Men urinating openly. Though the booze has run out, som… [+9199 chars]

articles.title: The secrets of Wood Farm – the Queen's favourite retreat - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Modest by Royal standards, the farmhouse on the Sandringham Estate has been a bolthole for everyone from Prince Philip to Queen Alexandra
articles.content: Prince Philips life at Wood Farm was relatively modest but only by Royal standards. His staff didnt wear Royal livery. And, although the Queen will have a cook on call at Wood Farm, she will know the… [+1515 chars]

articles.title: Meat Loaf – a complicated musical giant - The Conversation CA
articles.description: Hits like Bat of Hell and I’d Do Anything for Love (But I Won’t do That) characterise a career of risk-taking and genre-bending that also saw some spectacular lows.
articles.content:
Ridiculed by critics and custodians of cool, Meat Loafs bombastic performances were loved by millions, providing the soundtrack to the lives of various generations.
